title: Anneliese Dodds – 2021 Comments on Lex Greensill’s No.10 Business Card
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 30 March 2021.
content:
This raises further serious questions about the special access Lex Greensill was granted to the heart of government.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

The public have a right to know what happened here – we need a full, transparent and thorough investigation.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
